text.content:
Ported Barrel | | | | +1 | | Cannot also be threaded

Match Barrel (Match Ammo) | +3 | | | | | Cannot also be precision

Match Barrel (Supermatch Ammo) | +4 | | | | | Cannot also be precision

Precision Barrel (Standard Ammo) | +1 | | | | | Cannot also be match

Precision Barrel (Match Ammo) | +2 | | | | | Cannot also be match

Slug Barrel (Slug) | +2 | | | | | Slugs ignore range penalty to damage

Slug Barrel (Non-Slug) | -4 | | | | |

Choked Barrel (Bird) | +3 | | | | |

Choked Barrel (Buck) | +1 | | | | |

Choked Barrel (Other) | -2 | | | | | Non-birdshot and non-buckshot

Compact Barrel | -1 | | | | | Attack penalty to all attacks, no other barrel upgrades

Muzzle Brake | | | | +3 | | Barrel must be threaded

Compensator | | | | +2 | | Cannot also be threaded or ported

Balanced Red Dot Sight | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to all within first five range increments

Quick Red Dot Sight | +2 | | | | | Attack bonus to all within first range increment

Ghost Ring Sight | +2 | | | | | Attack bonus to all within first four range increments

Balanced Advanced Combat Sight | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to all within first five range increments

Standard Laser (Single) | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to single shots within first range increment, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Standard Laser (Potshot) | +2 | | | | | Attack bonus to potshots within first range increment, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Infrared Laser | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to single shots and potshots within first two range increments, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Standard Laser (Single) | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to single shots within first range increment, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Standard Laser (Potshot) | +2 | | | | | Attack bonus to potshots within first range increment, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Infrared Laser | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to single shots and potshots within first two range increments, cannot combine with other sight attack bonuses

Vertical Foregrip | | | | +2 | |

Angled Foregrip | +2 | | | | | Attack bonus to single shots and double taps

Magazine Foregrip | | | | +1 | |

Vertical Grippod (Stowed) | +1 | | | +1 | | Attack bonus to single shots and potshots

Vertical Grippod (Deployed) | +2 | | | +1 | | Attack bonus to single shots, potshot, double taps, and burst fire

Bipod (Deployed) | +3 | | | | | Cannot also benefit from grips or slings

Custom Handle | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to all attacks for owner

Personalized Weapon | +4 | 1 | | | -1 | Attack bonus to all attacks for owner, CP reduction for all actions for owner

Razor Sharp | | 3 | | | |

Reinforced | | 2 | | | | Damage bonus for bludgeoning attacks

Weighted | -2 | | 1 | | | Attack penalty to all attacks, damage bonus for bludgeoning attacks

[Weapon] Specialist | +1 | | | | -1 | Attack bonus and CP reduction for all attacks

Simple Weapon Specialist | | | | | -1 | CP reduction for all attacks with chosen weapon

Autofire Proficiency (Autofire) | | | | +4 | | Reduces recoil for autofire

Autofire Proficiency (Bumpfire) | | | | +1 | | Reduces recoil for bumpfire

Autofire Proficiency (Sweep/Sprayfire) | | | | +3 | | Reduces recoil for sweepfire and sprayfire

Burst Fire Proficiency | | | | +2 | | Reduces recoil for burst fire

Autofire Mastery (Most) | | | | +2 | | Reduces recoil for autofire, sweepfire, sprayfire, and burst fire with three or more rounds

Autofire Mastery (2RB) | | | | +1 | | Reduces recoil for burst fire with two rounds

Double Tap Proficiency | | | | +2 | | Reduces recoil for double taps

Slamfire Proficiency | | | | +3 | | Reduces recoil for slamfires

Slamfire Expert | | | | +3 | | Reduces recoil for slamfires

Favored Type | | 3 | | | | Damage bonus to weapon attacks with chosen type

Grenadier | +3 | | | | | Attack bonus to all thrown explosives and splash weapons

Rifle Expert | | | 2 | | -1 | Reduces CP for all attacks, damage dice increase for autofire, burst fire, sprayfire and sweepfire with SMGs

Pistol Expert (Semi) | | | 1 | | -2 | Reduces CP for all attacks, damage dice increase for double taps with non-machine pistols

Pistol Expert (Machine) | | | 2 | | -2 | Reduces CP for all attacks, damage dice increase for autofire, burst fire, sprayfire, and sweepfire with machine pistols

Revolver Expert | +2 | | | | -3 | Reduces CP for all attacks, attack bonus for potshots

Shotgun Expert | +4 | | | | -1 | Reduces CP for all attacks, attack bonus for potshots

Shotgun Ace | | | | | -5 | Reduces CP for no-miss shots

Break Barrel Shotgunner | +3 | | | | | Attack bonus to all attacks

Break Barrel Shotgun Expert (Single) | | | | | -4 | Reduces CP for single shots

Break Barrel Shotgun Expert (Double) | | | | | -3 | Reduces CP for doublefire

Custom Grip | +1 | | | | | Attack bonus to all attacks for owner

Ergonomic Stock | +3 | | | | -1 | Attack bonus and CP reduction for single shots for owner

Fixed Stock | | | | +2 | -1 | Reduces CP for single shots

Synthetic Stock | | | | | -2 | Reduces CP for single shots

Buffer Stock | | | | +5 | |

Bumpfire Stock (Bump) | +4 | | | | | Attack bonus to bumpfire

Bumpfire Stock (Single/Double) | -2 | | | | | Attack penalty to single shots and double taps

Detachable Stock | +1 | | | +1 | | Attack bonus to single shots and double taps

Integral Stock | | | | +2 | |

Buttpad | | | | +1 | | Requires a stock
